title: Functional Values Table
text: The functional values are shown in the table. Note: the values in this table were obtained using a calculator and using all the places given in the calculator output.\n##figure1.gif##

title: The Approaching Limit
text: As we read down the $$\frac{1}{x}$$ column, what are the values approaching?

title: Finding /lim{x,0**-,1/x}
text: The values of $$\frac{1}{x}$$ decrease without bound as $$x$$ approaches $$0$$ from the left. As such, we conclude that /lim{x,0**-,1/x}=-inf. The graph of $$f(x)=\frac{1}{x}$$ in the figure confirms these conclusions.\n##figure2.gif##
